java/liquibase/change/ExecuteShellCommandChange.java

00001 package liquibase.change;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.database.Database;
00004 import liquibase.database.sql.SqlStatement;
00005 import liquibase.database.structure.DatabaseObject;
00006 import liquibase.exception.UnsupportedChangeException;
00007 import liquibase.log.LogFactory;
00008 import liquibase.util.StreamUtil;
00009 import liquibase.util.StringUtils;
00010 import org.w3c.dom.Document;
00011 import org.w3c.dom.Element;
00012 
00013 import java.io.IOException;
00014 import java.util.ArrayList;
00015 import java.util.List;
00016 import java.util.Set;
00017 
00021 public class ExecuteShellCommandChange extends AbstractChange {
00022 
00023     private String executable;
00024     private List<String> os;
00025     private List<String> args = new ArrayList<String>();
00026 
00027     public ExecuteShellCommandChange() {
00028         super("executeCommand", "Execute Shell Command");
00029     }
00030 
00031 
00032     public String getExecutable() {
00033         return executable;
00034     }
00035 
00036     public void setExecutable(String executable) {
00037         this.executable = executable;
00038     }
00039 
00040     public void addArg(String arg) {
00041         this.args.add(arg);
00042     }
00043 
00044 
00045     public void setOs(String os) {
00046         this.os = StringUtils.splitAndTrim(os, ",");
00047     }
00048 
00049     public SqlStatement[] generateStatements(Database database) throws UnsupportedChangeException {
00050         boolean shouldRun = true;
00051         if (os != null && os.size() > 0) {
00052             String currentOS = System.getProperty("os.name");
00053             if (!os.contains(currentOS)) {
00054                 shouldRun = false;
00055                 LogFactory.getLogger().info("Not executing on os "+currentOS+" when "+os+" was specified");
00056             }
00057         }
00058 
00059         if (shouldRun) {
00060             List<String> commandArray = new ArrayList<String>();
00061             commandArray.add(executable);
00062             commandArray.addAll(args);
00063 
00064             try {
00065                 ProcessBuilder pb = new ProcessBuilder(commandArray);
00066                 pb.redirectErrorStream(true);
00067                 Process p = pb.start();
00068                 int returnCode = 0;
00069                 try {
00070                     returnCode = p.waitFor();
00071                 } catch (InterruptedException e) {
00072                     ;
00073                 }
00074                 StreamUtil.copy(p.getErrorStream(), System.err);
00075                 StreamUtil.copy(p.getInputStream(), System.err);
00076 
00077                 if (returnCode != 0) {
00078                     throw new RuntimeException(getCommandString()+" returned an code of "+returnCode);
00079                 }
00080             } catch (IOException e) {
00081                 throw new UnsupportedChangeException("Error executing command: " + e);
00082             }
00083 
00084         }
00085         return new SqlStatement[0];
00086     }
00087 
00088     public String getConfirmationMessage() {
00089         return "Shell command '" + getCommandString() + "' executed";
00090     }
00091 
00092     private String getCommandString() {
00093         return executable + " " + StringUtils.join(args, " ");
00094     }
00095 
00096     public Element createNode(Document currentChangeLogDOM) {
00097         Element root = currentChangeLogDOM.createElement(getTagName());
00098         root.setAttribute("executable", getExecutable());
00099 
00100         for (String arg : args) {
00101             Element argElement = currentChangeLogDOM.createElement("arg");
00102             argElement.setAttribute("value", arg);
00103             root.appendChild(argElement);
00104         }
00105 
00106         return root;
00107 
00108     }
00109 
00110     public Set<DatabaseObject> getAffectedDatabaseObjects() {
00111         return null;
00112     }
00113 }
